Before having read the information on th: Before having read the information on this site: Did you know that DeJā is a ticket-free event, meaning we do not sell tickets for entry to this gathering?
DeJā is a co-creative and participant dr: DeJā is a co-creative and participant driven event. There are no spectators. There is no programme.
DeJā is built on co-creation and a commu: DeJā is built on co-creation and a community that takes care of each other. This event does not happen without your efforts to cooperate and volunteer. You do not need prior experience, and if this is your first DeJā, you are highly encouraged to participate! If you'd like to be part of one of the Ministries, please let us know by marking your preferred area(s) in the options below. Note that this is not binding, you only agree to be contacted with the option to participate.
